name: Blood Red Stars
description:
In Blood Red Stars, you play as a man who has just awoken from cryogenic sleep on a star station to find some of his crewmates missing in the eerie silence. As you explore the vast and intricate station, you uncover the secrets of what happened to the crew and what drove them to delusion.

The gameplay  is a combination of exploration, puzzle/mystery solving, and decision making. You must manage your interactions and keep your mind open. The story is designed to challenge your problem-solving skills and creativity, and requires you to think outside the box to progress and understand the story.

The game's environment is reminiscent of old Atari and GameBoy games, with attention to detail in every nook and cranny. From the abandoned bowels of the ship to the desolate living quarters, each area has its own unique atmosphere and history waiting to be uncovered.

As you progress through Blood Red Stars, you will uncover the secrets of what happened to the crew and what caused the station to become deserted. The story is engaging, with subtle twists and turns that will keep you on the edge of your seat until the very end.
